headline: Pizza Hut closing 250 US stores as parent company considers selling the brand
summary: Pizza Hut plans to close 250 U.S. restaurants in the first half of this year as its parent company considers a sale of the chain.  Yum Brands said Wednesday it’s targeting underperforming Pizza Hut restaurants in its system.  Pizza Hut has more than 6,000 locations in the U.S.

headline: A Look At Domino’s Pizza (DPZ) Valuation After Recent Share Price Weakness
summary: Domino's Pizza stock performance snapshot Domino's Pizza (DPZ) has drawn investor attention after a mixed stretch, with the share price near $401.73 and total return figures showing a 5.5% decline year to date and a 10.2% decline over the past year. See our latest analysis for Domino's Pizza. Recent trading has been soft, with the share price at $401.73 after a 2.4% decline over the past month and a modest 0.1% 3 month share price return. The 3 year total shareholder return of 18.6% contrasts...
